name: QuickTurn
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quick turn
des:
Welcome to quick turn, a two player competition!

First, each player will register as either player one or two. Both of you will then start by facing away from each other. I will then start to count down from three to one. After each number, you will both take one step away from each other, and on one you will both turn around, point at each other, and yell bingo. Afterwards, I will determine who had the quickest turn!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
